scripts.serve: node -e "require('http').createServer((req, res) => { const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const filePath = path.join(__dirname, 'dist', req.url === '/' ? 'index.html' : req.url); if (fs.existsSync(filePath) && fs.statSync(filePath).isFile()) { res.writeHead(200); res.end(fs.readFileSync(filePath)); } else { res.writeHead(200); res.end(fs.readFileSync(path.join(__dirname, 'dist', 'index.html'))); } }).listen(9292);"
